Contact

I am currently a first-year undergraduate student at University of California, San Diego. You could reach me through a variety of ways.

E-mail

I own this domain name liu.ms a combination of my family name “liu”「刘」and my given name “min sheng”「闽晟」. Practically, any address at this domain should reach my mailbox, but I prefer people choosing to the following addresses based on the accompanying descriptions:

  • lambda at this domain, for all computer science/programming related things.
  • i at this domain, for all personal things.
  • hi at this domain, for general things.

If you think you are not very close to me, please use the third address.

Alternatively, you can always reach me using the email arranged by UCSD, which is minsheng at you know where.

Online Services

I currently use:

  • GitHub
  • Twitter
  • Reddit
  • 知乎

Over the last few years I have been actively using nicknames selveskii and notcome, so if you see these two names online, it’s probably me.
